A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Was it \"great?\" Nope...\nWas it better than Episodes 1-3? VERY much so...\nI definitely feel bad for JJ Abrams\, his hard work and story he set up was pretty much scraped... but the movie was solid in it's own right. The negative hype will cool... it's a good Star Wars movie\, plain and simple. We were spoiled with an excellent Rogue One and an Above average Force Awakens... so yes\, this feels like a disappointment\, but it's really not.
